tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From the initial consultation to post-surgery follow-up, Dr. Sudhanshu as professional and attentive. His **** ********* *** meticulous approach ensured a successful procedure. My father is recovering well, thanks to his expertise. Dr Sudhanshu showed great empathy and understanding, addressing all our concerns with patience. His surgical skills are exceptional, and the pacemaker implantation was flawless. We couldn't have asked for a better doctor.
The doctor examined the issue properly of my father whose bp was very high and helped us in the situation of panic. Thanking the dotor gor the same!

I just wanted to leave few words about Dr Parida, who I literally found through google search as I was desperate to find a specialist to give advice regarding my father's uncontrolled hypertension. (I am a doctor myself and live and practice in UK)
I have been super impressed with his professionalism, helpfulness and responsiveness. He comes across as highly competent and knowledgable who also has great mannerism. He has been extremely patient and understanding with my father who was very stressed hence contacted him just for reassurance at times.
 I can't recommend enough Dr Parida who has been our saviour in the times of need and difficulties. Sending my immense gratitude and best wishes his way.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sudhansu is an outstanding cardiologist. Genuinely knowledgeable and one of the best in his field. Dr is very welcoming and makes you feel almost at home. He gives ample of time to his patients and looks into each and every detail to ensure his patients get the best of care and treatment. Highly recommend it he doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor have to give treatment first not recommended for admissions. Doctor have take care about patient *** *********  Doctor have to amicable not rude. Always give their prescriptions to patients about their illness. Doctor have to ask about health not about whether u would like to admit other wise go to OPD. Neither the doctor or any staff  have ethic to talk with patient. They did not think about the mental status of patient. At high fever the doctor did not give any first aid just angrily told go to OPD. We will give treatment to admissions patient only and also requested to max hospital well wishes pl save cctv footage and check about your doctor and staff behaviour
It was a nice visit there. Doctors and other staff are very helpful. I would if you have any issues related to heart you can visit here
Doctor immediately approaches and addresses ur problem and gives precise and genuine advice regarding ur problem.
first of all nice person, always give right suggestions, humble, love his work and always ready to help patient with good suggestions, explain everything easily.. intelligent as well..

Warm and patient. And immediate response. His assistant is also very good. 
Doctor explained and asked for test and he looked at the reports immediately. prescribed medicine that’s working fine. Feeling better since the visit.

The doctor is a specialist of his field and quickly understands the issue, gives a patient hearing and diagnoses effectively...........
Happy to have visited Dr Parida......
